oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
According to the colophon (f. 14r), copy completed on 7 Jumādá al-Ākhirah 903 AH [January 30, 1498 AD].
Reading (muṭālaʻah) note signed Ismāʻīl ibn al-Kharrāṭ al-Kabīr, 1058 AH [1648 AD].
MS Arab 233. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
